name: Anonymous
com:
Decode this: ENT1yWWhLL-Qz9mK

A Twitter snowflake ID is a 64-bit binary number, with 41 bits representing a timestamp, 10 bits representing a machine ID, and 12 bits representing a per-machine sequence number. The snowflake ID is generally serialized in decimal format and is used in the post URL.

For example,
https://twitter.com/i/status/1581674019991916545
Decoding 1581674019991916545:
{'creation_time_milliseconds': 1665935447105,
'datacenter_id': 10,
'machine_id': 337,
'sequence_id': 1,
'server_id': 17}

The filename of a Twitter photo also contains a base64-encoded snowflake ID. This can be decoded into a regular snowflake ID, although it contains three "extra" unknown bytes.
For example,
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FdMR2WDaMAMPt2q?format=jpg
FdMR2WDaMAMPt2q -> 1572620320212922371

It is unknown if the filename of a Twitter video also contains a snowflake ID. You can see the URL contains it, but any off-platform video would would only contain the file name.
For example,
https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1564378065198882816/pu/vid/960x720/ENT1yWWhLL-Qz9mK.mp4

How would "ENT1yWWhLL-Qz9mK" be decoded into a snowflake, if it's possible?

Resources:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Snowflake_ID
https://discord.com/developers/docs/reference#snowflakes (good visualizations, twitter uses another epoch)
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xVrPoNutyqTdQ04DXBEZW4ZW4A5RAQW2he7qIpTmG-M/edit
>>1263648

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>1292874
>How would "ENT1yWWhLL-Qz9mK" be decoded into a snowflake, if it's possible?
It's not base64 because - is not a valid character in base64. So I'm going to go ahead and say it's not possible to decode this into a snowflake.

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>1292924
It's URL safe base64.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Base64#Variants_summary_table
Both the image and video filenames have those characters.

name: Ted Bundy
sub: Hey YOU! Recommend me an anime between 2010 and now?
com:
im a 30+ year old male who use to like watching anime. However the older i get, the more picky i become with said subject.

>things i like
>Adventure,Romance,Character developement, Rich Story, unique stories, Lore, Comedy, Harems(if the protagnoist isnt a total bitch)

>favs ive watched
(old)
Bleach: I loved the action, and was one of the few anime i watched in english. always a fan of Ichigos english voice actor
Inuyasha: Its combination of Fantasy and the awkward romance between kagome and Inuyasha was adorable.
One Piece: still watching this one. love the whole crew.
Dragon ball/z: Some really cool fights in that show.
GoSick: Unique story, cute romance
Eureka 7: Sort of gave me the same feelings from inuyasha and GoSick
Full Metal Alchemist: one of my favs to date. had everything i enjoyed.
Gundam Seed: Giant mechas, cool protagnoist, decent romance.
Ghost in the Shell: Great OST, and a cool original story.
Death Note: You dont want to know what id do with that book...
(new)
Grimoire of Zero: Nice story, nice fantasy feel, and both main characters developed a relationship nicely i thought
Skeleton Knight in another world: Any anime that puts the protagonist inside a game has been my favs recently.
Darling in the Franxx. VERY unique story i thought. An original. Loved the character developement.
Rise of the Shield Hero: Same feel as skeleton Knight. I liked this one more cause of the bit of romance between his partner.

The only thing i really dont like is a wimpy,weak protagonist that has 0 sense about women.

sub: How to make my ethernet device work?
com:
I have a small tplink LS1005G, and I cant connect almost anything on it, but a laptop with the r8168 driver refuses to work at all, checked cables, changed cables, make a manually configuration, copy the values from another working machine with the same configuration.
The same machines worked fine before.

The usual setup was
PC1----------------------|
PC2----------------------|
MODEM/ROUTER...|-------------------LS1005G
or
PC1----------------------|
PC2----------------------|-------------------LS1005G

any of the former worked out, so I don'k know
why it changed and it does make his job,
Thanks anon!

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>1293798
>LS1005G
You probably have a cable with a damaged pair, so the switch and the NIC think they can do gigabit (which uses all four pairs), but then it doesn't work.

Try a brand-new cable, or force the driver to not autonegotiate but instead select 100 Base TX (which uses only two pairs).

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>1293803
Thanks anon, the extra I forgot to write before it's when (I think) the module is autonegotiating, the leds are off a while, then suddenly it supposedly works (the applet show it is connected) but then it is lost. and repeat all over again.
I have tested with to cables, but not new, Im testing the already working pair, because you are right I'm transfering the bulk of it via the modem, but it can handle only 100Mb not 10000 so it sure take its time.
Thanks for your kind answer

sub: What do you think they're worth?
com:
Found these among my old cards today. I don't know squat about prices, and the ones I see online vary to an insane amount
Any guess if these are worth anything?

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
Solely based on what I can see from the image, there is prominent surface marring on the middle card and light edge-wear on the far right/scratches. I cannot tell if there is a large scratch on the far left or if that is a piece of hair I'm seeing by the wing. These cards look to be in fair condition - if you wanted to auction off as a NM, lightly played, lightly played set you could probably ask for $90 USD as a starting price point. For comparison, a card of the same language without surface marring and edgewear could probably retail for $80+ by itself, especially if it were graded with a PSA of 8+.

Bought and sold Yugioh/other CCGs around a decade ago. Have a Dark Magician Girl I pulled from the Magician's Force set over 15 years ago, still in mint condition. It's not 1st edition, but still could fetch $200-$300. Got a gold-star Vaporeon probably in the same bracket as far as price. Lot of Naruto cards in great condition that retail now at $15 - $100+ individually. Have every single set of Duel Masters cards completed and in pristine condition too, a lot of those still retail for some absurd prices. Had SW miniatures at another point in time - some of those are worth ridiculous amounts of money, especially if the model is good.

FYI, cost of PSA grading is dependent upon market value of what you are having graded. Expect to spend more money on a grading the more the card itself is worth based on marketplace speculation. As far as selling is concerned, don't ever sell to a shop if you ever want to realize true market value for yourself. Sell through a vendor like ebay or Amazon and take into account the cost of shipping to the buyer for yourself if/when you do so.

戦闘スタイルは、敵に張り付いて 【衝動】を使いひたすら殴り続ける頭の悪い戦法。 先手必勝をモットーとし、1ターン目から 鬼のような火力を発揮するが、そのおかげで ターン終了時には狂気点はほぼ真っ黒に染まる。 衝動連撃の終わり際にはファンプルを出して 敵味方の区別が無くなる狂戦士っぷりを随所で見せた。 【かぎづめ】の攻撃能力は最終的に 【怪力】 【 ガントレット】【狂鬼】 で 肉弾2+2 出目+1 コスト2 となった。
デザインした当初はもっと 子供っぽくなる予定だったんだけど 姉妹間での享年最年長という事もあり、 セッションの流れで結局お姉さんポジに。 しかし姉御なリーダーポジかと思いきや ・戦闘中クスリのやりすぎで戦闘が終了 してもトルエン以外の周り全て敵に見え 危うく姉妹二人をプチ殺しかけた困ったちゃ/w。 発狂ロールを濁らせる一番の要因。 キャンベーン終盤は流石にこれ以上迷惑は掛けられないと クスリをあまり使わすに理性的に戦う事を覚えたようだ。 (実情は対話判定に失敗し続け狂気点に余裕が無くなり 衝動があまり使えなくなったから)|
ここでは語らないけど、生前の話でも超好みなキャラに してもらったのでNCにとても感謝してる。

last_replies.com:
>>1292961
[Looking back on my PC Kiefer-kun after the end]

I felt that she has very strong emotional ties with Toluene. Almost all of her action is based on "for Toluene", a hardcore Toluene-fanatic. She will do anything if it's for Toluene. Although she was always near Toluene and looking for physical contact too much, she doesn't have any feelings of love for Toluene, rather it's something coming from friendship. However that friendship is pretty close to dependence.

For her combat style, it's a mindless strategy of getting close to the enemy and using [Impulse] to keep hitting the enemy. With her motto being "the first one who strikes wins", she could deliver tremendous damage right from turn 1, but when the turn ends her sanity points would be almost completely black {*1}. When the impulse combo ends with a fumble, she shows her inner-berserker, losing the ability to distinguish friends and foes. In the end, [claw]'s attack power reached hand-to-hand 2 +2, pips +1, cost 2 with [superhuman strength], [gauntlet] and [raging demon].

I was planning for a more child-like design at the start, but her age at death is the oldest among the sisters, and she was in the position of an older sister more as the session went on. However, contrary to the expectation of an older-sister-like leader, she was a troublesome kid that would use too many drugs during a battle, and see everyone around Toluene as enemies even after the battle, almost killing two sisters in the process. That's the main reason for messing up the madness roll {*2}. Near the end of the campaign, she seemed to learned to fight more rationally using less drugs to not cause even more trouble to her sisters. (The reality is that she kept failing talking checks and ended up with no sanity points to spare, so impulse was rarely used)

I won't talk about it here, but I am very grateful to NC for letting me to turn her into my favorite character with her story before death too.
